channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Benson Boone Covers Sam Fender’s ‘Seventeen Going Under’ at Montreux Jazz Festival
item.description: 🎤 Benson Boone brings the vibes at Montreux Jazz Festival with his cover of Sam Fender's 'Seventeen Going Under' 🌟 #MusicMagic

item.title: Margo Price – “Don’t Wake Me Up” (Feat. Jesse Welles)
item.description: 🌟 Grooving into the weekend with @MissMargoPrice's new track "Don't Wake Me Up" featuring the amazing Jesse Welles! 🎶💃 #NewMusicFriday

item.title: The Cult Announce Fall Tour with Separate Set as Death Cult
item.description: 🎸 Get ready to rock as The Cult hit the road this fall! 🤘 Who's excited for their special Death Cult set? #RockOn #TheCultTour

item.title: Verses GT (Jacques Greene + Nosaj Thing) announce debut album, touring: hear “Your Light” ft. George Riley
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to groove with Verses GT! Debut album and tour coming your way, listen to 🔥 "Your Light" now! 🕺 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: James Gunn’s Superman Sparks 513% Interest in Pet Adoptions — Thanks to Krypto
item.description: 🐶🦸‍♂️ Who knew a superhero could inspire so much goodness? Krypto the Superdog saves the day yet again! #AdoptDontShop 🎶
